parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.58</value></part><part><name>Game Version (number surrounded by NO SPACES)</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Triggers </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Markers </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr3</name>=<value> Locations </value></part><part><name>GROUP3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr4</name>=<value> Positions </value></part><part><name>GROUP4</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks whether given position is inside given area. The area is usually a rectangle or an ellipse defined similar to [[triggerArea]] format. Hence argument for this command could be a trigger, a marker, a location or an array in format [center, a, b, angle, isRectangle, c]. This command also supports hexagon area which can be created from ellipse when both a and b are negative. Hexagon ellipses are also supported by both marker creation and [[drawEllipse]]. <br><br>
Alternatively, use [[inAreaArray]] to check multiple positions/objects within area. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> position [[inArea]] trigger </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> position: [[Array]] or [[Object]] - position in format [[Position3D]], [[Position2D]] or [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> trigger: [[Object]] - existing trigger </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> position [[inArea]] marker </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> position: [[Array]] or [[Object]] - position in format [[Position3D]], [[Position2D]] or [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> marker: [[String]] - existing marker </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s3</name>=<value> position [[inArea]] location</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p41</name>=<value> position: [[Array]] or [[Object]] - position in format [[Position3D]], [[Position2D]] or [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER41</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p42</name>=<value> location: [[Location]] - existing location </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER42</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r3</name>=<value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s4</name>=<value> position [[inArea]] [center, a, b, angle, isRectangle, c]</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p61</name>=<value> position: [[Array]] or [[Object]] - position in format [[Position3D]], [[Position2D]] or [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER61</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p62</name>=<value> center: [[Array]] or [[Object]] - center of the area in format [[Position3D]], [[Position2D]], [[Object]] or [[Group]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER62</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p63</name>=<value> a: [[Number]] - x axis (x / 2)</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER63</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p64</name>=<value> b: [[Number]] - y axis (y / 2) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER64</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p65</name>=<value> angle: [[Number]] - rotation angle  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER65</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p66</name>=<value> isRectangle: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if rectangle, [[false]] if ellipse</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER66</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p67</name>=<value> c (Optional): [[Number]] - z axis (z / 2). Default: -1 (unlimited) ''since Arma 3 v1.59.135137''</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER67</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r4</name>=<value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE4</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_playerIsInside = [[player]] [[inArea]] _myTrigger;</code></value></part><part><name>Example1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_positionIsInside = _myPosition [[inArea]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[100, 100, 0], 20, 30, 45, [[false]]];</code></value></part><part><name>Example2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>[[inAreaArray]], [[triggerArea]], [[in]], [[inPolygon]], [[drawEllipse]], [[drawRectangle]], [[createTrigger]], [[createMarker]], [[createLocation]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
